title: Computer Extension
description: This plugin allows to restart & shutdown the computer as well as logging you off
longDescription:
Version: V.1.0


This product will no longer be updated due to the release of the .bat Extension which includes all the features of this product. It is not recommended to buy the Computer Extension but it will be for sale for the next few months until it gets fully removed from the marketplace.


The Computer Extension plugin for Unreal Engine allows you to perform actions such as restarting and shutting down your computer, as well as logging off. This can be useful in situations where you need to restart your computer for a firmware update or other specific purpose. The plugin also provides information about the computer, which may be useful for certain purposes.


There are a few important notes to consider when using this plugin. First, there may be a delay before the actions initiated by the plugin are executed. We are working on addressing this issue. Additionally, using the "Fetch System Info" feature may cause your application to lose focus on the computer's input. We are also working to fix this issue.


Overall, the Computer Extension plugin offers a range of useful features for interacting with your computer and gathering information about it through Unreal Engine.


Looking to save some money? There's no need to spend big bucks on pricey freelancers to create a plugin. Instead, simply share your desired plugin on my Discord server and I'll add it to my to-do list. Let me help bring your vision to life without breaking the bank!


We are now featuring support tickets on our Discord server!

Changelog:

Version 1.0 (Nov 19, 2022)

  • Release with 4 nodes
technicalDetails:
Features (All Nodes):
  • Shutdown Computer - Shuts down the computer
  • Restart Computer - Restarts the computer
  • Log Off Current User - Log out of the currently logged-in user
  • Fetch System Info - Fetches important information from the computer


List of what the "Fetch System Info" node fetches: (Full list only available in docs)
  • Host Name -> The name assigned to the computer by the user or system administrator
  • OS Version -> The version number of the operating system
  • Registered Owner -> The email you used to login to Microsoft on your windows machine
  • Product ID -> The key of the activated copy of windows
  • System Boot Time -> When your computer got booted
  • System Type -> The type of computer, including the architecture (e.g. "x64-based PC")
  • Available Physical Memory -> The amount of physical memory (RAM) currently available for use


Code Modules:

  • Â BAS_Computer_E, Runtime


Number of Blueprint Nodes: 4

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64
